an4.118:1.1: “Cattarimani, bhikkhave, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassaniyani samvejaniyani thanani.
an4.118:1.3: ‘Idha tathagato jato’ti, bhikkhave, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassaniyam samvejaniyam thanam.
an4.118:1.4: ‘Idha tathagato anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddho’ti, bhikkhave, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassaniyam samvejaniyam thanam.
an4.118:1.5: ‘Idha tathagato anuttaram dhammacakkam pavattesi’ti, bhikkhave, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassaniyam samvejaniyam thanam.
an4.118:1.6: ‘Idha tathagato anupadisesaya nibbanadhatuya parinibbuto’ti, bhikkhave, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassaniyam samvejaniyam thanam.
an4.118:1.7: Imani kho, bhikkhave, cattari saddhassa kulaputtassa dassaniyani samvejaniyani thanani”ti.
